line_2: In short, size, colour, voice, and shape,

line_1: It maks guid fellows girn an' gape,
line_2: Wae worth that man wha first did shape,

line_1: It maks guid fellows girn an' gape,
line_2: That vile, wanchancie thing — a raep!

line_1: It maks guid fellows girn an' gape,
line_2: An' Robin's bonnet wave wi' crape
